plot: While Dina lost herself during her long years she is living this "WAG"-life, spring chicken Judith finds her new life alongside an up-and-coming footballer quite exciting. Dina decides to rescue Judith - and finally rescues herself.
title: WAGs
plot_es: While Dina lost herself during her long years she is living this "WAG"-life, spring chicken Judith finds her new life alongside an up-and-coming footballer quite exciting. Dina decides to rescue Judith - and finally rescues herself.
plot_en: While Dina lost herself during her long years she is living this "WAG"-life, spring chicken Judith finds her new life alongside an up-and-coming footballer quite exciting. Dina decides to rescue Judith - and finally rescues herself.

produce.name: Hochschule für Film und Fernsehen 'Konrad Wolf'
